name: hono-guide
description: Build ultrafast web APIs and apps with Hono across any JavaScript runtime. Covers routing, Context API, 25+ built-in middleware (auth, CORS, caching, security), type-safe RPC client, Zod/Standard Schema validation, JSX rendering, streaming/SSE, WebSocket, cookie/JWT helpers, testing patterns, and deployment to Cloudflare Workers, Bun, Deno, Node.js, AWS Lambda, Vercel, Netlify, and more.
